channel.title: kotlin on Learnkt
channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on Learnkt

item.title: Hello Kotlin
item.description: Here is a simple program that prints “Hello, world!”: fun main(args: Array<String>) { println("Hello, World!") } In Kotlin: fun is used to declare a function the `main()`` function is where your program starts from the body of a function is written within curly braces {} println() and print() functions print their arguments to standard output
